signs.movement_description: Hold the 'A' handshape steady in front of the body.
signs.source_description: Hold the 'A' hand in front of the body.

signs.dominant_handshape: A Hand transitioning to N Hand
signs.end_location: Slightly to the right of the start location.
signs.movement_description: Fingerspell the letter 'A', then transition to the 'N' handshape while moving the hand slightly to the side.
signs.source_description: Spell the letters 'A' and 'N' while moving the hand slightly to the right.

signs.movement_description: Hold the 'T' hand with the palm facing up, then rotate the wrist forward so the palm faces forward.
signs.source_description: Hold the 'T' hand with the palm facing upward and rotate it forward.

signs.movement_description: Place the 'N' hand under the chin and move it straight forward.
signs.source_description: Place the 'N' hand under the chin and move it forward.

signs.movement_description: Place the middle finger of the 'P' hand under the chin and move it straight forward.
signs.contact_point: Middle finger may brush the chin.
signs.source_description: Place the middle finger of the 'P' hand under the chin and move it forward.

signs.dominant_handshape: A Hand transitioning to D Hand
signs.movement_description: First, place the 'A' hand at the left side of the mouth. Then, move it across to the right side of the mouth while changing to a 'D' handshape.
signs.source_description: Place the 'A' hand at the left side of the mouth then place the 'D' hand at the right side of the mouth.
